    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Recipe</string>
            <string language="es">Recetas</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rezept</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Receita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricetta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνταγή</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson there is a lot of conversation and is one way of creating a recipe with the class.</string>
            <string language="es">En esta lección hay un montón de conversación y es también una forma de crear una receta con la clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sa ceacht seo, tá go leor comhrá ar an ábhar agus bealach amháin chun tabhairt faoi oideas a dhéanamh leis an rang.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plean Ceachta</string>
            <string language="ga">Lesson Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion gibt es eine Menge Gespräch und 
ist One-way des Erstellens eines Rezepts mit der Kategorie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon il y a beaucoup de conversation 
et est one-way de créer une recette avec la classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição há uns muitos da conversação e 
está um one-way de criar uma receita com a classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione ci è conversazione molto ed
è one-way di creazione della ricetta con il codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα υπάρχει πολλή συνομιλία και 
υπάρχει ένας τρόπος μια συνταγή με την κλάση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
